name: api_ui_EditorGUI
description: These work pretty much like the normal GUI functions - and also have matching implementations in EditorGUILayout.

properties.name: BeginChangeCheck
properties.description: Starts a new code block to check for GUI changes.

properties.name: BeginDisabledGroup
properties.description: Create a group of controls that can be disabled.

properties.name: BeginFoldoutHeaderGroup
properties.description: Make a label with a foldout arrow to the left of it.

properties.name: BeginProperty
properties.description: Create a Property wrapper, useful for making regular GUI controls work with SerializedProperty.

properties.name: BoundsField
properties.description: Makes Center and Extents field for entering a Bounds.

properties.name: BoundsIntField
properties.description: Makes Position and Size field for entering a BoundsInt.

properties.name: ColorField
properties.description: Makes a field for selecting a Color.

properties.name: CurveField
properties.description: Makes a field for editing an AnimationCurve.

properties.name: DelayedDoubleField
properties.description: Makes a delayed text field for entering doubles.

properties.name: DelayedFloatField
properties.description: Makes a delayed text field for entering floats.

properties.name: DelayedIntField
properties.description: Makes a delayed text field for entering integers.

properties.name: DelayedTextField
properties.description: Makes a delayed text field.

properties.name: DoubleField
properties.description: Makes a text field for entering doubles.

properties.name: DrawPreviewTexture
properties.description: Draws the texture within a rectangle.

properties.name: DrawRect
properties.description: Draws a filled rectangle of color at the specified position and size within the current editor window.

properties.name: DrawTextureAlpha
properties.description: Draws the alpha channel of a texture within a rectangle.

properties.name: DropdownButton
properties.description: Makes a button that reacts to mouse down, for displaying your own dropdown content.

properties.name: DropShadowLabel
properties.description: Draws a label with a drop shadow.

properties.name: EndChangeCheck
properties.description: Ends a code block and checks for any GUI changes.

properties.name: EndDisabledGroup
properties.description: Ends a disabled group started with BeginDisabledGroup.
